title: Outage Map Inquiry
description: A customer is looking at the utility's public outage map and wants to know why their specific house isn't showing inside the outage polygon.

tasks.description: Explain that the outage map polygons are estimates and individual addresses may not be perfectly represented.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates how the map works.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's address in the internal outage management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the OMS to confirm the customer's address is officially part of the outage event.

tasks.description: Reassure the customer that crews are aware of their outage and provide the ETR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reassures the customer and provides the necessary information.
